transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Yes sir.
Executive: Ha madam namaste hamara registration ho gaya India se hamara subscription hua hai.
Executive: Sir kaun si company se baat kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Hamara Ankita cosmetics.
Executive: Kaunsa?
Customer: Ankita cosmetics.
Executive: Apni registered number bata sakte hain kya aap?
Customer: Hamara number hai 78.
Executive: 78.
Customer: 78.
Executive: Ankita cosmetics se baat kar rahe hain sir aap?
Customer: Ha Ankita cosmetics se baat kar rahe hain madam.
Executive: Achcha Ankita cosmetics se.
Customer: Ji sir bataiye kya problem aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Suniye hamara jo ye humne plan liya hai lekin aapki taraf se kuch bhi inquiry nahi aa rahi madam uske upar call to customer ke aa hi nahi hamari company bhi upar show nahi kar rahi madam.
Executive: Aapki company bhi show nahi kar rahi hai?
Customer: Nahi matlab ye kya hai matlab kaisa kya hoga madam humne subscription ka pura plan liya aap logo ne pehle bola tha ki aapka subscription rahega aapko daily inquiries bhi aayengi achchi.
Hmm. Uske baad me kya aayenge to madam kuch bhi nahi aa raha inquiry message ki aa rahi hai to madam ji aapke pehle inquiry aayi madam 3:15 baje se.
Customer: Ek hi inquiry aayi madam ek din me.
Customer: Customer ko.
Executive: Inquiry to sir aapke paas 13 inquiry aayi hai is month mein che din mein 13 inquiry aayi hai sir.
Executive: Check kara aapne.
Executive: Lead to aapne 10 consume kari hai theek hai but aapne jo aapke paas customer ki direct inquiry aati hai lead manager pe check kariye aap wo.
Customer: Kya kare?
Executive: Lead manager pe check kariye sir.
Customer: Kahan se check karna padega madam mujhe wo?
Executive: Lead manager lead manager pe jaaiye aap.
Customer: Ha lead manager se to aa gaya madam main.
Executive: Theek hai waha pe sir aap dekhenge aapke paas direct inquiry aa rahi hogi.
Customer: Is month mein mail usme mail aur message bana hua hai.
Customer: Madam mera problem yahi to tha sir uske liye madam subscription plan dene se pehle aap logo ne kaha tha ki aapko achcha hoga.
Executive: Sir lead to aapko waise hi mil rahi hai aap dekhiye to pehle aap ek baar inquiries check to kariye sir.
Customer: Inquiry jo hai wo aap check kariye 11 inquiry aayi hai sir aap ye bataiye kitna area cover karte hain aap kitne area mein.
Customer: Company ka customer ko show hi nahi ho raha hai.
Hmm.
Customer: Hamara company ka customer ko show hi nahi ho raha hai bhi nahi aa rahi inquiry bhi nahi aa rahi message bhi nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Customer ko show nahi ho raha hai aap unko link share kar rahe hain to wo show nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Madam wo show kar madam samjhe meri baat ko hum koi link wagera kisi ko share nahi kar rahe hain customer ko.
Executive: Sir aapki aawaz sahi nahi aa rahi aapne ear buds lagaye hain kya ya fir lead.
Customer: Ear buds laga madam abhi nikal ke.
Executive: Sir aapki aawaz na bilkul slow aa rahi hai.
Customer: Hello sir ye bol raha hu.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha madam jo hai na wo India Mart se inquiry nahi aa rahi hai jabki humne plan liya tha to aapne bola tha ki bahut sari inquiry aayenge aisa hoga waisa to aisa koi inquiry aur apna jo pura display wo show nahi ho raha hai customer taraf.
Executive: Show nahi ho raha hai achcha sir aap na aapke paas catalog views bhi aa rahe hain sir aap agar check karenge to kafi achcha catalog view bhi aapka aa raha hai plus aapke paas kafi achchi inquiry bhi bhi aa rahi hai aur aur display unka matlab aapka.
Customer: Catalog views kahan pe dikhta hai madam?
Executive: Hmm?
Customer: Catalog views kahan pe dikhta hai?
Executive: Sir wahi aap by lead pe jaaiye.
Customer: By lead pe okay. Ji.
Executive: Aapke paas to sir inquiries bhi kafi achchi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ha ha inquiry hai madam.
Customer: Inquiry ek hi aayi hai madam.
Executive: Inquiry sir aapke paas Ankita cosmetics se baat kar rahe hain na sir aap total aapke paas total aapke paas sir is month mein 13 inquiry aayi hai 13 aap ek kaam kariye abhi aap desktop laptop kuch hai aapke paas is time pe phone.
Customer: Mobile hai.
Executive: Mobile hi hai mobile hi hai isme India Mart login hai?
Customer: Ha. Ha. Theek hai.
Executive: Achcha sir dekhiye main aapko batati hu video meet hum kal schedule kar lenge but abhi dekhiye aapko lead jo aapki profile hai sir wo show ho rahi hai customer ko ye kisi ne aapko complain kara hai kya ki aapka profile show nahi ho raha hai hamare side se to show ho raha hai sir.
Customer: Madam wo inquiry to aani chahiye madam inquiry aani chahiye madam inquiry nahi aa rahi na wo problem wo hai.
Executive: Inquiry ki baat kar rahe hain sir aap ya lead ki baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Madam lead hai madam.
Customer: Lead paye madam?
Executive: Sir dekhiye hamare paas India Mart mein teen type se business hota hai ek hota hai by lead jisko aap consume karke customer ko call karte hain jaate hain na location ka filter lagate hain aur fir waha pe contact buyer now pe click karke fir customer ko call karte hain.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ye by lead ho gayi ek dusra hota hai sir direct inquiry direct inquiry mein kya hota hai customer India Mart pe jata hai aapka catalog dekhta hai fir waha pe contact supplier jaise aap contact buyer pe click karte hain wo contact supplier pe click karta hai.
Customer: Ha wo aare na.
Executive: Aur wo wala aapke paas is month mein 14 aa chuka hai 14.
Customer: Ha wo kaise show hoga?
Executive: Aur wo main aapko batati hu kaise hoga plus aapke paas sir is month mein call ki agar hum baat kare to aapke paas is month mein teen call aa chuki hai jo ki aapne ek par bhi receive nahi kari hai number bhi aapne galat dala hua hai.
Customer: Ek bhi call aapne receive nahi kari hai.
Executive: Madam aaj ke din ka kya hai wo sirf batao na aaj ke din ka koi inquiry jo hai by lead mein ya fir direct direct call bhi nahi aaya aaj koi.
Executive: Sir teen call aa chuki hai aapne receive hi nahi kara ek bhi call teen call aa chuki hai call ab sir main ye date to nahi hamare paas date ka data nahi show hota hai but hamare paas ye rehta hai ki ha aapke paas kitni call aayi hai is month mein to is month mein bhi che din hue hain usme already aapke paas teen call aa chuki hai.
Executive: Aur ek screenshot bhejiye screenshot ek lead manager ka screenshot bhejiye aap mujhe whatsapp pe aur sir main aapko apna whatsapp number de rahi hu aap us pe call kar lijiyega.
Customer: Whatsapp number?
Customer: Manager ko nahi madam hamare.
Executive: Ek minute sir.
Customer: Ha manager kon hai puch rahe.
Executive: Dono number hi whatsapp pe nahi hai na apna whatsapp number sir whatsapp number bataiye apna apna whatsapp aap apna whatsapp number kya hai tumhara 922.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: 030.
Customer: 030.
Executive: 5874.
Customer: 5874. Ji ye wala number sir pehle to aap save kar lijiye mere naam se mera naam Tanu hai Tanu India Mart ke naam se save kar lijiye aap jab bhi aapko koi bhi dikkat hogi aap is number pe call kariyega theek hai customer care pe mat kariyega sir mere number pe call kariyega.
Customer: Okay okay. Theek hai sir.
Executive: Kyunki customer care pe aap call call kar diya aapne na to hum mere upar ek concern open ho gaya hai ki shayad main aapko number share nahi kar raha ho ya contact nahi kiya unko wo lagta hai ki mere pe lag nahi raha hai phone to isliye mere upar ek concern open ho gaya hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha. Ji sir to aap mujhe lagta hai ki shayad aapke paas nahi hai to aap mere theek hai theek hai theek hai ruko ruko mail aayega abhi ispe. Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving inquiries from IndiaMART.

- Company profile not showing to customers.

- Display not showing to customers.



Resolution:

- Informed customer about catalog views and inquiries.

- Explained direct inquiry process.

- Provided personal WhatsApp number for direct contact.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to send lead manager screenshot on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, catalog, profile, whatsapp
